comments:
Reproduced by:
- right-click on a breakpoint
- choose "Breakpoint Properties..." in the context menu
- click the OK-button

The following stack trace appears in the error log for each click on the OK-button:

re-open to mark as works for me

I get the same exception with M4 and Win-NT, so that I can't change the
breakpoint properties.

This looks like a dup of bug 27857. I am not able to reproduce it on the latest
